title: The Absence
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
The seething nothingness in the shape of a human being, the...thing that cannot be; the **Absence.**
It stood there, in the barren desert of what was once North America.
@@@@
And it asked itself a question.
@@@@
[[collapsible show="To Be, or Not to Be?" hide="Not to Be."]]
[[f>image absence.jpg]]
Drawn on Concept with a finger..
